item.description:
Create one of kind pins, rings, earrings or pendants using recycled bottle caps, papers, magazines, photos and found objects. You will learn how to cure your piece to prevent distortion as well as how to prepare a non-toxic jeweler’s resin to preserve your piece. A number of techniques and tips will be covered.

Bottle caps and resin are provided. Students are welcome to bring additional materials including papers and found objects. These can also be purchased at Abeille at a 10% discount along with any findings to transform your bottle caps into pins, rings, pendants, cuff links or earrings.

Please note that resin needs 24 hours to cure so it’s best to leave your materials over night to dry.

Dates: Sunday, November 29 at 3pm
Duration: 2 hours
Fee: $35
Skill Level: 14

To register please call Abeille at 617.232.4343 or for more information visit our website Abeille!

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Bottle Cap Jewelry
